017package org.microbean.constant;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.Constable;
021import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
024import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
025import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
026
027import java.util.Arrays;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.Comparator;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.Map.Entry;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.Set;
035import java.util.SortedMap;
036import java.util.SortedSet;
037
038import java.util.function.Function;
039
040import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
041import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
042import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_List;
043import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
044import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
045import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Set;
046import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
047
048import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collections;
049import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Comparator;
050import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Entry;
051import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_SortedMap;
052import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_SortedSet;
053import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_TreeMap;
054import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_TreeSet;
055
056import static org.microbean.invoke.ConstantDescs.CD_BootstrapMethods;
057
058public final class Constables {
059
060  private Constables() {
061    super();
062  }
063
064  public static final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final ConstantDesc cd) {
065    if (cd == null) {
066      return Optional.of(NULL);
067    } else if (cd instanceof Constable c) {
068      return c.describeConstable();
069    } else {
070      return Optional.of(cd);
071    }
072  }
073
074  public static final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Constable c) {
075    return c == null ? Optional.of(NULL) : c.describeConstable();
076  }
077
078  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements) {
079    return describeConstable(elements, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
080  }
081
082  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements,
083                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
084    return describeConstable(elements, Constables::empty, f);
085  }
086
087  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements,
088                                                                             final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
089                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
090    if (elements == null) {
091      return Optional.of(NULL);
092    } else if (elements instanceof List<? extends E> l) {
093      return describeConstable(l, CD_List, cf, f);
094    } else if (elements instanceof Set<? extends E> s) {
095      return describeConstable(s, CD_Set, cf, f);
096    } else {
097      return Optional.empty();
098    }
099  }
100
101  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final List<? extends E> elements) {
102    return describeConstable(elements, CD_List, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
103  }
104
105  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final List<? extends E> elements,
106                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
107    return describeConstable(elements, CD_List, Constables::empty, f);
108  }
109
110  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Set<? extends E> elements) {
111    return describeConstable(elements, CD_Set, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
112  }
113
114  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Set<? extends E> elements,
115                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
116    return describeConstable(elements, CD_Set, Constables::empty, f);
117  }
118
119  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Set<? extends E> elements,
120                                                                             final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
121                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
122    return describeConstable(elements, CD_Set, cf, f);
123  }
124
125  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map) {
126    return describeConstable(map, Constables::empty, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
127  }
128
129  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map,
130                                                                                final Function<? super K, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> kf,
131                                                                                final Function<? super V, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> vf) {
132    return describeConstable(map, Constables::empty, kf, vf);
133  }
134
135  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map,
136                                                                                final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
137                                                                                final Function<? super K, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> kf,
138                                                                                final Function<? super V, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> vf) {
139    if (map == null) {
140      return Optional.of(NULL);
141    } else if (map instanceof Constable c) {
142      return c.describeConstable();
143    } else if (map.isEmpty()) {
144      if (map instanceof SortedMap<? extends K, ? extends V> sm) {
145        final Comparator<?> comparator = sm.comparator();
146        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
147          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
148            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
149          if (comparatorDesc != null && comparatorDesc.isPresent()) {
150            return
151              Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
152                                     "immutableSortedMapOf",
153                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap, CD_Map, CD_Comparator),
154                                     callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map, "of", CD_Map),
155                                     comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
156          }
157        }
158        return Optional.of(callStatic(CD_Collections, "emptySortedMap", MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap)));
159      }
160      return Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map, "of", CD_Map));
161    } else {
162      final ConstantDesc[] args = new ConstantDesc[map.size()];
163      int i = 0;
164      for (final Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> entry : map.entrySet()) {
165        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> e = describeConstable(entry, kf, vf);
166        if (e.isEmpty()) {
167          return Optional.empty();
168        }
169        args[i++] = e.orElseThrow();
170      }
171      final ConstantDesc unsortedMap =
172        callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map,
173                            "ofEntries",
174                            MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Map, CD_Entry.arrayType()),
175                            args);
176      if (map instanceof SortedMap<? extends K, ? extends V> sm) {
177        final Comparator<?> comparator = sm.comparator();
178        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
179          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
180            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
181          if (comparatorDesc != null && comparatorDesc.isPresent()) {
182            return
183              Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
184                                     "immutableSortedMapOf",
185                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap, CD_Map, CD_Comparator),
186                                     unsortedMap,
187                                     comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
188          }
189        }
190        return
191          Optional.of(callStatic(CD_Collections,
192                                 "unmodifiableSortedMap",
193                                 MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap, CD_SortedMap),
194                                 construct(CD_TreeMap,
195                                           new ClassDesc[] { CD_Map },
196                                           unsortedMap)));
197      }
198      return Optional.of(unsortedMap);
199    }
200  }
201
202  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> entry) {
203    return describeConstable(entry, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
204  }
205
206  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> entry,
207                                                                                final Function<? super K, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> kf,
208                                                                                final Function<? super V, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> vf) {
209    if (entry == null) {
210      return Optional.of(NULL);
211    } else if (entry instanceof Constable c) {
212      return c.describeConstable();
213    } else {
214      final K k = entry.getKey();
215      final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> key;
216      if (k instanceof Constable c) {
217        key = c.describeConstable();
218      } else if (kf == null) {
219        key = Optional.empty();
220      } else {
221        key = kf.apply(k);
222      }
223      if (key.isPresent()) {
224        final V v = entry.getValue();
225        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> value;
226        if (v instanceof Constable c) {
227          value = c.describeConstable();
228        } else if (vf == null) {
229          value = Optional.empty();
230        } else {
231          value = vf.apply(v);
232        }
233        if (value.isPresent()) {
234          // Map#entry(K, V)
235          return
236            Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map,
237                                            "entry",
238                                            MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Entry,
239                                                              CD_Object, // K erasure
240                                                              CD_Object), // V erasure
241                                            key.orElseThrow(),
242                                            value.orElseThrow()));
243        }
244      }
245      return Optional.empty();
246    }
247  }
248
249  private static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements,
250                                                                              final ClassDesc listOrSetClassDesc,
251                                                                              final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
252                                                                              Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
253    if (elements == null) {
254      return Optional.of(NULL);
255    } else if (elements instanceof Constable c) {
256      return c.describeConstable();
257    } else if (elements.isEmpty()) {
258      if (elements instanceof SortedSet<? extends E> ss) {
259        final Comparator<?> comparator = ss.comparator();
260        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
261          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
262            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
263          if (comparatorDesc != null && comparatorDesc.isPresent()) {
264            return
265              Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
266                                     "immutableSortedSetOf",
267                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedSet, CD_Collection, CD_Comparator),
268                                     callInterfaceStatic(CD_List, "of", CD_List),
269                                     comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
270          }
271        }
272        return Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(CD_Collections, "emptySortedSet", CD_SortedSet));
273      }
274      return Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc, "of", listOrSetClassDesc));
275    } else {
276      if (f == null) {
277        f = Constables::empty;
278      }
279      final int elementsSize = elements.size();
280      final ConstantDesc[] args = new ConstantDesc[elementsSize];
281      int i = 0;
282      for (final E element : elements) {
283        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> arg;
284        if (element instanceof Constable c) {
285          arg = c.describeConstable();
286        } else {
287          arg = f.apply(element);
288        }
289        if (arg == null || arg.isEmpty()) {
290          return Optional.empty();
291        }
292        args[i++] = arg.orElseThrow();
293      }
294      final MethodTypeDesc ofMethodTypeDesc;
295      if (elementsSize <= 10) {
296        // List.of() and Set.of() have explicit polymorphic overrides
297        // for parameter counts of up to 10.
298        final ClassDesc[] parameterArray = new ClassDesc[elementsSize];
299        Arrays.fill(parameterArray, CD_Object); // Object is the erasure of E
300        ofMethodTypeDesc = MethodTypeDesc.of(listOrSetClassDesc, parameterArray);
301      } else {
302        // After 10 parameters, List.of() and Set.of() fall back on
303        // varargs.
304        ofMethodTypeDesc = MethodTypeDesc.of(listOrSetClassDesc, CD_Object.arrayType());
305      }
306      if (elements instanceof SortedSet<? extends E> ss) {
307        final Comparator<?> comparator = ss.comparator();
308        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
309          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
310            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
311          return
312            Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
313                                   "immutableSortedSetOf",
314                                   MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedSet, CD_Collection, CD_Comparator),
315                                   callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc,
316                                                       "of",
317                                                       ofMethodTypeDesc,
318                                                       args),
319                                   comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
320        }
321        return
322          Optional.of(callStatic(CD_Collections,
323                                 "unmodifiableSortedSet",
324                                 MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedSet, CD_SortedSet),
325                                 construct(CD_TreeSet,
326                                           new ClassDesc[] { CD_Collection },
327                                           callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc,
328                                                               "of",
329                                                               ofMethodTypeDesc,
330                                                               args))));
331      }
332      return
333        Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc,
334                                        "of",
335                                        ofMethodTypeDesc,
336                                        args));
337    }
338  }
339
340  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> construct(final ClassDesc cd, final ClassDesc[] constructorParameterTypes, final ConstantDesc... args) {
341    final ConstantDesc[] newArgs = new ConstantDesc[args == null || args.length <= 0 ? 1 : args.length + 1];
342    newArgs[0] = MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(cd, constructorParameterTypes);
343    if (newArgs.length > 1) {
344      System.arraycopy(args, 0, newArgs, 1, args.length);
345    }
346    return DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, newArgs);
347  }
348
349  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> callInterfaceStatic(final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final ClassDesc returnType) {
350    return callInterfaceStatic(cd, name, MethodTypeDesc.of(returnType));
351  }
352
353  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> callInterfaceStatic(final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final MethodTypeDesc sig, final ConstantDesc... args) {
354    return call(DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.INTERFACE_STATIC, cd, name, sig, args);
355  }
356
357  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> callStatic(final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final MethodTypeDesc sig, final ConstantDesc... args) {
358    return call(DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC, cd, name, sig, args);
359  }
360
361  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> call(final DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind kind, final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final MethodTypeDesc sig, final ConstantDesc... args) {
362    final ConstantDesc[] newArgs = new ConstantDesc[args == null || args.length == 0 ? 1 : args.length + 1];
363    newArgs[0] = MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(kind, cd, name, sig);
364    if (newArgs.length > 1) {
365      System.arraycopy(args, 0, newArgs, 1, args.length);
366    }
367    return DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, newArgs);
368  }
369
370  private static final <T> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> empty(final T ignored) {
371    return Optional.empty();
372  }
373
374}
